title: DESEDA The Sirens Silk Twill Scarf
description:
The Sirens is based on an original multimedia collage created by Miami based artist Simon Vargas. Paying homage to the beauty and magic of the Amalfi Coast, the The Sirens call us all to indulge our senses and escape to the truly spectacular. All DESEDA silk scarves are designed by emerging artists from around the world. Their original artwork is printed on luxe silk in Italy, then finished in the U.S. in limited editions.

  • Dimensions: 35 x 35 in.
  • Materials: 100% silk twill
  • Care Instructions: Dry clean only
